form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: AFFIDAVIT OF SUPPORT, WOLCOTT FORM 290 - REV. 9-56

full_text: Screened by NARA, 5/9/2023 8 pt. type or larger AFFIDAVIT OF SUPPORT GENERAL STATE OF CALIFORNIA, SS. County of LOS ANGELES I, JULIAN ARANDA PLANCARTE, married, of age, residing at 1651 West 22nd. Street, Los Angeles 7 California BEING FIRST DULY SWORN, deposes and says: That I am acitizen of Mexico, but lawfully and legally admitted to the United States of America, as a permanent resident, through the port of San Ysi- dro, California, on June 13th. 1958, Alien Registration Card bearing number A 11 786 267 That it is my intention and desire that the following persons, resi- ding at present at the City of Merida, State of Yucatan, Republic of Mexico, come and live with me in the United States of America, as permanent residents.- That the names of these persons are: SOCORRO RODRIGUEZ de ARANDA, female, about 40 years of age, native and citizen of - Mexico, and who is related to me as MY WIFE, and MARIA EUGENIA del SOCORRO ARANDA RODRIGUEZ, female, single, 19 years of age, native and citizen of Mexico, and - GUADALUPE MARLENE ARANDA RODRIGUEZ, - female, 15 yrs. of age, nat. & cit. of Mexico- EVANGELINA DE LOURDES ARANDA RODRIGUEZ, female, 12 yrs. of age, native and citizen - of Mexi.co.- That the prospective immigrants, are related to me as MY WIFE and DAUGHTERS That I am permanently employed by "BEVERLY WILSHIRE" at Beverly Hills, California, and have been so employed for that concern since July 7th. 1958, and derive a salary of $ 10.35 per day, in addition to meals.- That the prospective immigrants are my dependents.- That I am willing and able to receive, maintain and support the pros pective immigrants, listed above, my wife and daughters.- That I guarantee to the Hon. American Consul and the Immigration and Naturalization Service, that the above named persons are not persons who will become a public burden in the event that they are admitted to come and live with me in the United States of America, as permanent residents.- That the prospective immigrants, are persons of good moral conduct and character. Julian Ananda Plancarte JULIAN ARANDA PLANCARTE SUBSCRIBED and sworn to before me November 2124 1958 , Rolet G. Beach Notary Public in and for said County and State. My Commission Expires Aug. 4, 1960 (NOTARIAL SEAL) the AFFIDAVIT - GENERAL This standard form covers most usual problems in the field indicated. Before you sign, read it, fill in all blanks, WOLCOTTS FORM 290 REV. 9-56 and make changes proper to your transaction. Consult a lawyer if you doubt the form's fitness for your purpose.
